enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: This item was referred by the COP to the SBI, which considered the issue on 4 December (FCCC/SBI/2007/25 and MISC.8).
The matter was then referred to a contact group chaired by Helmut Hojesky (Austria) and Crispin D'Auvergne (Saint Lucia).

The group did not make progress, with divisions between the G-77/China, which sought a COP decision, and the EU and other Annex I parties, which argued that SBI conclusions would suffice at this meeting.
With no adopted outcome, the SBI agreed in its closing plenary on 11 December to place the issue on the provisional agenda for SBI 28.
However, subsequent consultations undertaken by ministers during the high-level segment resulted in draft conclusions being approved by the COP on 14 December.
